name: Gaston Phillips
description: Gaston Phillips is a met in theWellsprings,HeywoodduringCyberpsycho Sighting: Letter of the Law. He bought a property fromZetatech, though he lost his lifetime savings, because he didn't read the fine print, which caused Zetatech to take the property away. Instead of giving it, he decided to fight them off, which made him succumb tocyberpsychosis.
